price: Nuti gaarreen isa waliin galgalaafi ganama kan Rabbiin faarsan ta’anii laaffifnee jirra.
arabic: إِنَّا سَخَّرۡنَا ٱلۡجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحۡنَ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ وَٱلۡإِشۡرَاقِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innā sakharnā al-jibāla maʿahu yusabbiḥ'na bil-ʿashiyi wal-ish'rāqi
